definition:
The [*support*]{} ${\operatorname{Supp}}(M)$ of a module $M$ over a ring
$R$ is the set of all prime ideals ${{\mathfrak{p}}}\subset R$ such that
the localization $M_{{\mathfrak{p}}}$ is nonzero.

The [*maximal support*]{} ${\operatorname{Supp}}_m(M)$ of a module $M$
over a ring $R$ is the set of all maximal ideals
${{\mathfrak{m}}}\subset R$ such that $M_{{\mathfrak{m}}}$ is nonzero.
